sentences.en: He spoke with a reedy, quavering voice.
sentences.cn: 他用尖细而颤抖的声音说话.

sentences.en: His voice was curiously high-pitched, reedy, almost effeminate.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音出奇地高，尖声尖气，有些娘娘腔。

sentences.en: The big man had a high-pitched reedy voice.
sentences.cn: 这个大个子男人声音又高又尖。

sentences.en: The reedy grass covered the whole area.
sentences.cn: 又细又长的草覆盖着整个地区.

words.tran_cn: [作物] 芦苇；簧片；牧笛；不可依靠的人
芦苇丛生的；芦苇做的；芦苇状的；似笛声的

trans.tran_cn: 芦苇丛生的，芦苇做的，芦苇状的，细长的
trans.tran_en: a place that is reedy has a lot of reeds growing there
